full_summary:
**Title: ** Inspection, Testing and Minor Repair (ITM) Services for Defence Construction Canada
===============

**Reference Number:** MX-43072118403
-------------------------

**Solicitation Number:** ES131762-76674
-------------------------

**Tender Closing Date:** May 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM (local time)
------------------------------------

**Contracting Entity:** Defence Construction Canada (DCC)
-----------------------------------------

**Contract Description:**

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking proposals from qualified service providers for the provision of Inspection, Testing, and Minor Repair (ITM) services for various systems at DCTF Galiano, Colwood, Victoria, British Columbia. The contract will involve regular and frequent inspection of HVAC, plumbing systems, gas detection systems, propane components, and general facilities infrastructure maintenance, in accordance with Department of National Defence (DND) requirements.

**Duration and Value:**

The initial contract period is expected to run from July 2, 2024, to March 31, 2027, with an estimated total value of $1,560,000. The contract may be extended for two optional periods of three years each, subject to mutual agreement between the contractor and DCC.

**Deliverables:**

The ITM services contract will require the provider to deliver the following:

* Regular and frequent inspection of HVAC, plumbing systems, gas detection systems, propane components, and general facilities infrastructure maintenance
* Implementation of additional work requests in accordance with Section 1.5 of the RFP
* Compliance with security requirements specified in the RFP

**Contract Evaluation:**

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the criteria established in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document. The objective of this RFP is to select the proponent with the highest total score.

**Submission and Contact Information:**

Proposals must be submitted through the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the closing date and time specified. Queries regarding this solicitation should be directed to Mark Smith, contact information as follows: mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca, 613-859-0549.

**Attachments and Additional Information:**

The RFP document, including all attachments, can be accessed via the MERX website. Fees may apply; see the MERX website for pricing information.

Please ensure that you have read and understood this notice thoroughly before proceeding with the submission of your proposal. If you have any questions or require clarification, please contact the relevant person identified above.
